subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: When Eddy Curry was robbed at gunpoint in his home outside Chicago, it was only the latest recent instance of violence involving a member of the Knicks or a prominent N.B.A. player.
snippet: When Eddy Curry was robbed at gunpoint in his home outside Chicago, it was only the latest recent instance of violence involving a member of the Knicks or a prominent N.B.A. player.
